item.description: Introduction Although GSoC 2021 is close to come to an end, there’s still a lot of exciting things going on around Bambi.

item.title: Robust linear regression in Bambi
item.description: The next thing in my TODO list for this Google Summer of Code season with NumFOCUS is to add new families of models to Bambi.

item.title: First weeks of GSoC
item.description: I am really happy to participate in this Google Summer of Code season with NumFOCUS to contribute to the Bambi library.

item.title: Why Bambi?
item.description: Introduction I’ve been thinking about writing a new blog post for a while now but honestly, there was nothing coming to my mind that made me think “Oh, yeah, this is interesting, it can be useful for someone else”.

item.title: How to generate bingo cards in R
item.description: Hello wor… Well, my first hello world post appeared about a year ago, but this site had the same fate as many of my othe side-projects… abandonment.
